title: [FSX] Virtual CDU v1.6
description:
Virtual Computer Display Unit for Flight Simulation

This is an app for Flight Simulator addicteds. You dont need anymore to open a window on your FS to check or input information on FMC using your mouse. You can just do it using your tablet or smartphone connected at your home wi-fi network.
It will act as a CDU and will allow you to interact with the FMC on your Flight Simulator. It interfaces with your FS using an application installed on PC, called VAInterface, through wi-fi network. All data related to FMC is displayed on Virtual CDU and touch keyboard inputs are directly sent to FS.

PRIOR PURCHASING, IMPORTANT TO KNOW :
1. Please test it using the Demo version available on Google Play to make sure that all components works perfectly for you.
2. Current Supported Add-ons
- PMDG 737 NGX for FSX (Works only with version SP1C original purchased from PMDG).
- IIFLY 737 (Works only with version 3.1 original purchased from IFLY)
3. Is necessary to download the software VAInterface from http://www.virtualavionics.com.br/user. This software will run on your PC and interface with FSX.
4. For better experience we support only wi-fi network.
